If you use maven, you can add the following part to your pom.xml

{{{ 
<repositories>
    <repository>
	<id>jowidgets</id>
			<url>http://jowidgets.org/maven2/</url>
			<releases>
				<enabled>true</enabled>
			</releases>
			<snapshots>
				<enabled>true</enabled>
			</snapshots>
		</repository>
	</repositories>
}}}
